H0.text: Which Canadian born actor played an Irishman in The Eagle Has Landed. Donald Sutherland

H1.text: Which Canadian born actor played an Irishman in The Eagle Has Landed. Christopher Plummer

H2.text: Which Canadian born actor played an Irishman in The Eagle Has Landed. William Shatner

H3.text: Which Canadian born actor played an Irishman in The Eagle Has Landed. Cataibh

A4.text: Donald Sutherland was given the role of Devlin after Richard Harris was removed.
